title: KASS MIU JA KARU RUKS AITAVAD LINDE

characters.name: KASS MIU
characters.description: Väike hall kass suurte roheliste silmadega, kandmas väikest sinist salli, suured uudishimulikud kõrvad ja sõbralik naeratus. Armas multifilmistiil.

characters.name: KARU RUKS
characters.description: Väike pruun karu suurte ümarate kõrvadega, kandmas väikest punast mütsi, suur nina ja rõõmsameelne naeratus. Armas multifilmistiil.

locations.name: Elutuba
locations.description: Cozy children's living room with light blue walls, soft green rug on the wooden floor, a large window on the back wall showing snowy trees outside, a low round wooden table in the center, and a small, soft grey armchair. Warm lamp light. Cartoon style.

locations.name: Lumi Aed
locations.description: Peaceful snowy garden with tall evergreen trees lightly covered in fresh white snow. A small, sturdy wooden bird feeder is visible on a tree branch. Gentle snow falling. Bright but soft winter daylight. Cartoon style.

pages.scene: Kass Miu and Karu Ruks are sitting comfortably on a soft grey armchair in a cozy children's living room with light blue walls, a soft green rug on the wooden floor. They are looking at a book together. Miu is wearing a blue scarf and Ruks a red hat. Warm lamp light illuminates the scene. A large window on the back wall shows snowy trees outside.

Kass Miu and Karu Ruks are standing by a large window in their cozy living room, looking out. Miu points with a paw towards the snowy trees outside. Ruks looks curious. Miu wears a blue scarf, Ruks a red hat. Snowy trees are visible through the window. Light blue walls, green rug, wooden floor are visible. Warm lamp light.

Kass Miu and Karu Ruks are sitting at a low round wooden table in their cozy living room, looking at each other with happy, thoughtful expressions. Miu has a paw on her chin, Ruks is smiling brightly. Miu wears a blue scarf, Ruks a red hat. Light blue walls, green rug, wooden floor are visible. Snowy trees are visible through the window. Warm lamp light.

Kass Miu and Karu Ruks are carefully looking through a small open basket filled with various craft supplies (like pinecones, strings, small berries) on the low round wooden table in their cozy living room. Miu holds up a pinecone. Ruks is looking into the basket. Miu wears a blue scarf, Ruks a red hat. Light blue walls, green rug, wooden floor are visible. Snowy trees are visible through the window. Warm lamp light.

Kass Miu and Karu Ruks are sitting at the low round wooden table in their cozy living room, actively molding soft, round 'bird food balls' with their paws. There are some finished balls on a plate next to them. Miu wears a blue scarf, Ruks a red hat. Light blue walls, green rug, wooden floor are visible. Snowy trees are visible through the window. Warm lamp light.

Kass Miu and Karu Ruks are sitting at the low round wooden table in their cozy living room. They are carefully tying short pieces of string (nööre) around the 'bird food balls' they made. Miu holds a ball with a string, Ruks is tying a knot. Miu wears a blue scarf, Ruks a red hat. Light blue walls, green rug, wooden floor are visible. Snowy trees are visible through the window. Warm lamp light.

Kass Miu and Karu Ruks are standing just inside the open front door of their cozy living room. They are dressed in warm winter clothes: Miu wears a blue scarf and a small blue winter coat, Ruks wears a red hat and a small red winter coat. Each holds a 'bird food ball' with a string. They look excited, stepping towards the snowy garden visible outside the door. Light blue walls, green rug, wooden floor are visible inside.

Kass Miu and Karu Ruks are outside in a peaceful snowy garden. Miu, standing on tiptoes, is carefully hanging a 'bird food ball' with a string onto a low branch of a snow-covered evergreen tree. Ruks is looking up, holding another 'bird food ball'. Both are dressed in warm winter clothes (Miu in blue scarf and coat, Ruks in red hat and coat). Gentle snow is falling.

Kass Miu and Karu Ruks are standing a little distance away in the snowy garden, watching happily. A few small, colorful birds are flying towards and landing on the 'bird food balls' hanging from the snow-covered evergreen tree branches. Miu and Ruks are smiling. Both are dressed in warm winter clothes. Gentle snow is falling.

Kass Miu and Karu Ruks are standing side-by-side in the snowy garden, waving happily towards the tree where the birds are now pecking at the food balls. They are smiling broadly. Birds are visible on the tree. Both are dressed in warm winter clothes. Gentle snow is falling.
